item.title: Rata
item.description: Installation $ npm install rata Usage const rata = require('rata') const data = [ ["eat", "eat some apples"], ["play", "play some music"], ["cry", "crying about your life"], ["makemehappy", "make happy!"] ] console.log(rata(data)) eat eat some apples play play some music cry crying about your life makemehappy make happy! const rata = require('rata') const data = [ ["eat", "eat some apples"], ["play", "play some music"], ["cry", "crying about your life"], ["makemehappy", "make happy!
